title: (Site Updates) Weird Gif Gallery
description: Added some new things you all sent me for the weird gif gallery.... truly some WEIRD submissions this time... keep 'em coming!!

title: (Site Updates) Mobile Friendly!
description: Woohoo!  The site is now (relatively) mobile-friendly.  On to greater things now! :-D.  Also, thank u to everyone who filled out the friend form!!  I have so many people to chat with and you all are so cool <3

title: (Site Updates)... EVERYTHING
description: Revamped site!  Now includes music pages, updated 'about me', photos, things to put on your website... well basically the whole thing's new.  So you really should check it out.  BUT there is also more to come so do stay tuned!!
